name: Space Wargame
description:
The player is in a closed arena, in which enemy ships of several types constantly appear. The player has access to 3 types of range weapons for combat: an automatic pistol, a shotgun for close range and a grenade launcher. Destroying opponents with a pistol, the player receives shotgun ammo. Every 45 seconds, a bonus for the player appears in the center of the arena, which, when picked up, gives the player ammo for all types of weapons and for the grenade launcher, which is the most powerful weapon in the game.

Built on Unreal Engine 4.
